about_the_game:
Welcome to Unknown FPV, an exhilarating first-person view (FPV) drone simulator that will take you on a thrilling ride through a ever-evolving stylized environment. Whether you're a seasoned pilot looking to hone your skills or a beginner eager to learn the art of flying, this simulator is the perfect training ground. Best of all, mastering the game will not only save you money but also equip you with the expertise to fly in real life.

Physics & Multiplayer
Unknown FPV's physics engine strives to replicate real-life dynamics but with a touch of arcade to make it more fun. And did we mention? Unknown FPV supports multiplayer, so you can challenge your friends and fellow pilots in exhilarating races and breathtaking stunts.

Exploration & Cinematics

In Unknown FPV you can chase cars along serpentine roads! Chase your friends in a dense forest dodging trees or venture across open landscape covered with breath taking grass.

Racing

Want to become one of the fastest pilots on this world? Unknown FPV features GP style racing course layouts so you can practice flying 6s style kamikaze drones!

Customization is fun but..
Customization is at the heart of Unknown FPV. You have the freedom to tweak the essential settings you'd typically adjust on your drone. Our team comprises seasoned FPV racing pilots, cinematic pilots, and freestyle pilots who have streamlined the customization process, eliminating unnecessary complexity and noise. Only the key settings remain, empowering you to spend less time in settings menu and more time flying.

We value your feedback
Our development team is fueled by the invaluable feedback and input of our community. We consider you, the player, an integral part of the development process, and that's why we're releasing the game in an early playtest phase. This approach allows us to focus on what truly matters and ensures that we build a game that resonates with you as a pilot.

What is left you might ask?
Well, join us on this journey to make FPV simulators great again. Together, we'll shape Unknown FPV into the ultimate playground for drone enthusiasts.
Get ready to push your limits, unlock your potential, and experience the pure joy of flying.

A very important notice!
You need a controller to play this game, PS4, Xbox will work, the best experience is achieved using a transmitter if you have one.
Support can only be offered in English. There is no menu support for controllers yet!
detailed_description:
Early Beta Access

Playtest development phase is open!

  • Try out the Demo version of the game.
  • Head over to our Discord; we use that as our preferred communication platform for bugs and feature requests.


Notice

Unknown: FPV Drone Simulator requires a controller in order to play. Playing with a keyboard and mouse isn't supported.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Monterey
  • Processor: M1 Based
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest MacOS
  • Processor: M1 Max
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

name: Unknown FPV : Drone Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quadcore processor @ 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: RC Transmitter or Gamepad is needed to control
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Quadcore processor @ 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Unknown FPV: The ultimate FPV drone simulator. Master the art of flying in a stylized world. Awesome physics, customizable settings, and multiplayer support. Beginners learn, experts escape. Join us on the journey to make FPV simulators great again.
